mema samuluwa heta (9) sethsiripaye pihiti ema amathyansha shrawanagarayedi pawathwe.me sankalpaya kriyawata nanwima mangin nishpadanaya karana bhandawala suwisheshi thaththwaya wanuye eewa parisara hithakami wimayi.swadhina wu karmika prathipalayak lesa wiwidha wu bahujathika samagam nirmanaya wi lokaya purama bihi wi wyaptha wiya..wiwrutha aarthika ratawath samangi nirmanaya wu welenda pola parisaraya jathika mattama abhibawa jathyantharayata piyawara esawiya.indiyawa wani sanwardhanaya kara sighrayen gaman karana ratawal thama kuda saha madhyama parimana wyapara sandaha meyin mahath rukulak laba maha parimana wyapara sandaha manpeth wiwara karagena atha.
